short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your GPA below your grades list on veracross student portals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically pull your grades and calculate your weighted and unweighted GPA and display them under your existing grades in the Veracross student dashboard. We do not store or log any of your login information or student information.
